PrismaMod:IllyaCarnivalPrismaAstolfo.NAME: Carnival Prisma Astolfo
PrismaMod:IllyaCarnivalPrismaAstolfo.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. Randomly gain one of the following: heal !M!, !M! strength, !M! dexterity, !M! max health, 20 gold.
PrismaMod:IllyaCarnivalPrismaAstolfo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. Randomly gain one of the following: heal !M!, !M! strength, !M! dexterity, !M! max health, [#3ddf3d]30[] gold.

PrismaMod:IllyaCarnivalDefend.NAME: Carnival Defend
PrismaMod:IllyaCarnivalDefend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block and channel !M! prismamod:defend orb.

PrismaMod:IllyaUncommonAOEAttack.NAME: Slicing Blaze
PrismaMod:IllyaUncommonAOEAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies and apply !M! weak.

PrismaMod:IllyaAssassinRevenge.NAME: Assassin's Reflex
PrismaMod:IllyaAssassinRevenge.DESCRIPTION: When you are attacked channel 1 prismamod:poison orb and inflict !M! poison onto attacker for this turn.

PrismaMod:IllyaCarnivalOrbs.NAME: Carnival Orbs
PrismaMod:IllyaCarnivalOrbs.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 of each prismamod:attack orb, prismamod:defend orb, prismamod:poison orb, prismamod:zwei orb, prismamod:testament orb and prismamod:assassin orb.

PrismaMod:IllyaMultiEvoke.NAME: Multi Evoke
PrismaMod:IllyaMultiEvoke.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Evoke the next orb X times without removing it.

PrismaMod:IllyaRapidFire.NAME: Rapid Fire
PrismaMod:IllyaRapidFire.DESCRIPTION: prismamod:strength_scaling . Deal !D! damage !M! times. Number of times is determined by the number of current orb slots.

PrismaMod:IllyaReinForce.NAME: Rein Force
PrismaMod:IllyaReinForce.DESCRIPTION: prismamod:dexterity_scaling . Gain !B! block !M! times. Number of times is determined by the number of current orb slots.

PrismaMod:IllyaSaphire.NAME: Sapphire
PrismaMod:IllyaSaphire.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. Gain !M! more orb slot. Draw !PrismaMod:SecondMagic! cards.

PrismaMod:IllyaUberChannel.NAME: Uber Channel
PrismaMod:IllyaUberChannel.DESCRIPTION: Randomly channel maximum number of orbs.

PrismaMod:IllyaUncommonEvoke.NAME: Quick Evoke
PrismaMod:IllyaUncommonEvoke.DESCRIPTION: Evoke and channel the first orb.

PrismaMod:IllyaUpgradeOrbs.NAME: Upgrade Orbs
PrismaMod:IllyaUpgradeOrbs.DESCRIPTION: Double evoke and passive effects for the turn.

PrismaMod:IllyaBlindPoisonToss.NAME: Blind Poison Toss
PrismaMod:IllyaBlindPoisonToss.DESCRIPTION: Randomly apply !PrismaMod:SecondMagic! poison to !M! random enemies.

PrismaMod:IllyaFeed.NAME: Feed
PrismaMod:IllyaFeed.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. Deal !D! damage. Heal for the amount of poison target has (max 15.)

PrismaMod:IllyaFriendMaker.NAME: Friend Maker
PrismaMod:IllyaFriendMaker.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to target enemy. Inflict !M! poison.

PrismaMod:IllyaRussianRoulette.NAME: Russian Roulette
PrismaMod:IllyaRussianRoulette.DESCRIPTION: Randomly apply !M! poison to anything in the room.

PrismaMod:IllyaStunPoison.NAME: Stun Poison
PrismaMod:IllyaStunPoison.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If that target is poisoned deal !D! more.

PrismaMod:IllyaDetonatingBlow.NAME: Detonating Blow
PrismaMod:IllyaDetonatingBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. prismamod:poison_expansion poison on the target.

PrismaMod:IllyaUncommonDefend.NAME: True Shield
PrismaMod:IllyaUncommonDefend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block and gain !M! plated armor.

PrismaMod:IllyaMaid.NAME: Maid
PrismaMod:IllyaMaid.DESCRIPTION: Take double damage for this turn.  Gain [E] [E] [E] energy next turn.

PrismaMod:IllyaZwei.NAME: Zwei Form
PrismaMod:IllyaZwei.DESCRIPTION: Clear all installs. Gain !M! strength, Gain 13 [E] , draw !PrismaMod:SecondMagic! cards, channel all prismamod:Zwei Orbs, and prismamod:complete_detonate all poison at the end of the turn. Next turn get -99 Strength and 99 Vulnerable. Lose all [E] every turn.

PrismaMod:IllyaAlice.NAME: Alice Form
PrismaMod:IllyaAlice.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. Gain !M! vulnerable. Chance to spawn a special prismamod:relic or heal !PrismaMod:SecondMagic!.

PrismaMod:IllyaTestament.NAME: Testament
PrismaMod:IllyaTestament.DESCRIPTION: Evoke all orbs. Channel maximum number of prismamod:Testament Orbs.

PrismaMod:IllyaGrailKun.NAME: Grail-Kun
PrismaMod:IllyaGrailKun.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 attack and 1 skill card from your deck and add it to your hand.

PrismaMod:IllyaPartialInstallAssassin.NAME: Assassin Partial Install
PrismaMod:IllyaPartialInstallAssassin.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. Deal !D! damage to all enemies every time you play an attack this turn.
PrismaMod:IllyaPartialInstallAssassin.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. Retain. Deal !D! damage to all enemies every time you play an attack this turn.

PrismaMod:IllyaMinorZwei.NAME: Minor Zwei Form
PrismaMod:IllyaMinorZwei.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block.  Add !M! burns to your hand.

PrismaMod:IllyaUberAttackChannel.NAME: Uber Attack Channel
PrismaMod:IllyaUberAttackChannel.DESCRIPTION: Channel max number of prismamod:attack orbs.

PrismaMod:IllyaUberDefendChannel.NAME: Uber Defend Channel
PrismaMod:IllyaUberDefendChannel.DESCRIPTION: Channel max number of prismamod:defend orbs.

PrismaMod:IllyaUberPoisonChannel.NAME: Uber Poison Channel
PrismaMod:IllyaUberPoisonChannel.DESCRIPTION: Channel max number of prismamod:poison orbs.

PrismaMod:IllyaInstallArcher.NAME: Install Archer
PrismaMod:IllyaInstallArcher.DESCRIPTION: prismamod:Install : Grants you 1 random 0 cost card each turn. Gain 1 strength each turn

PrismaMod:IllyaInstallAssassin.NAME: Install Assassin
PrismaMod:IllyaInstallAssassin.DESCRIPTION: prismamod:Install : prismamod:Evade the first attack for each turn.  All Attacks apply 1 poison.  Attacks deal !M!% of their damage and you take !PrismaMod:SecondMagic!% more damage from attacks, channel 1 prismamod:Assassin orb. Attacks to bosses deal an extra 3 block ignoring damage and apply 1 extra poison.

PrismaMod:IllyaInstallBerserker.NAME: Install Berserker
PrismaMod:IllyaInstallBerserker.DESCRIPTION: prismamod:Install : Take double damage and deal double damage.

PrismaMod:IllyaInstallCaster.NAME: Install Caster
PrismaMod:IllyaInstallCaster.DESCRIPTION: prismamod:Install : Gain 1 energized per turn. Increase passive and evoke effects on orbs. Gain 1 more orb slot. Channel 1 random orb each turn.

PrismaMod:IllyaInstallLancer.NAME: Install Lancer
PrismaMod:IllyaInstallLancer.DESCRIPTION: prismamod:Install : Apply weak, frail, and vulnerable every !M! attacks.

PrismaMod:IllyaInstallRider.NAME: Install Rider
PrismaMod:IllyaInstallRider.DESCRIPTION: prismamod:Install : Gain !M! dexterity every turn. Deal !PrismaMod:SecondMagic! block ignoring damage to all non-bosses every attack.

PrismaMod:IllyaInstallSaber.NAME: Install Saber
PrismaMod:IllyaInstallSaber.DESCRIPTION: prismamod:Install : Gain strength every turn. Deal !M! extra block ignoring damage to bosses. Heal !PrismaMod:SecondMagic!. First attack each turn deals 50% more damage.

PrismaMod:IllyaInstallForeigner.NAME: Install Foreigner
PrismaMod:IllyaInstallForeigner.DESCRIPTION: prismamod:Install : Double effect of evoked orbs. Evoked orb damage applies poison to the target.

PrismaMod:IllyaInstallAvenger.NAME: Install Avenger
PrismaMod:IllyaInstallAvenger.DESCRIPTION: prismamod:Install : Halve all non-boss damage and deal !M! damage to all enemies per turn.

PrismaMod:IllyaInstallAlterEgo.NAME: Install Alter Ego
PrismaMod:IllyaInstallAlterEgo.DESCRIPTION: prismamod:Install : Gain 1 orb slot, evoke first orb each turn, and all skill cards cost 1 less [E] to cast.

PrismaMod:IllyaInstallMoonCancer.NAME: Install Moon Cancer
PrismaMod:IllyaInstallMoonCancer.DESCRIPTION: prismamod:Install : Grants 1 random colorless card per turn.  Doubles the passive effects of orbs. Gain 1 orb slot.

PrismaMod:IllyaInstallRuler.NAME: Install Ruler
PrismaMod:IllyaInstallRuler.DESCRIPTION: prismamod:Install : Gain 1 strength and dexterity each turn.

PrismaMod:ChloeExhaustOne.NAME: Minor Deconstruction
PrismaMod:ChloeExhaustOne.DESCRIPTION: Select 1 card from your deck and exhaust it.  Gain !M! prismamod:arrows per card exhausted.

PrismaMod:ChloeExhaustTwo.NAME: Major Deconstruction
PrismaMod:ChloeExhaustTwo.DESCRIPTION: Select 2 cards from your deck and exhaust it.  Gain !M! prismamod:arrows per card exhausted.

PrismaMod:ChloeExhaustThree.NAME: Uber Deconstruction
PrismaMod:ChloeExhaustThree.DESCRIPTION: Select 3 card from your deck and exhaust it.  Gain !M! prismamod:arrows per card exhausted.

PrismaMod:ChloeDemonicTutor.NAME: Demonic Tutor
PrismaMod:ChloeDemonicTutor.DESCRIPTION: Select !M! card from your deck and add it to your hand.
PrismaMod:ChloeDemonicTutor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Select !M! cards from your deck and add it to your hand.

PrismaMod:ChloeDiscardRecovery.NAME: Trace Recovery
PrismaMod:ChloeDiscardRecovery.DESCRIPTION: Select !M! card from your discard pile and add it to your hand.
PrismaMod:ChloeDiscardRecovery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Select !M! cards from your discard pile and add it to your hand.

PrismaMod:ChloeHalloween.NAME: Trick or Treat
PrismaMod:ChloeHalloween.DESCRIPTION: Chance to get !M! curse card or !M! random card.
PrismaMod:ChloeHalloween.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Chance to get !M! curse cards or !M! random cards.

PrismaMod:ChloeMaid.NAME: Maid Form
PrismaMod:ChloeMaid.DESCRIPTION: Take double damage for this turn.  Gain [E] [E] [E] energy next turn.

PrismaMod:ChloeReshuffleDiscard.NAME: Regenerative Trace
PrismaMod:ChloeReshuffleDiscard.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle your discard pile into your deck and draw !M! cards.

PrismaMod:ChloeUnlimitedBladeWorks.NAME: Unlimited Blade Works
PrismaMod:ChloeUnlimitedBladeWorks.DESCRIPTION: Select up to 3 cards that you've traced before and add them to your hand at 0 cost.
PrismaMod:ChloeUnlimitedBladeWorks.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Select up to 3 cards that you've traced before and add them upgraded to your hand at 0 cost.

PrismaMod:ChloeCarnivalAOEAttack.NAME: Carnival AOE Attack
PrismaMod:ChloeCarnivalAOEAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Exhaust up to 1 card for each enemy hit.  Gain 2 prismamod:arrows for each card exhausted.

PrismaMod:ChloeCheapDefend.NAME: Magic Armor
PrismaMod:ChloeCheapDefend.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. Exhaust 1 card and gain 2 prismamod:arrows.

PrismaMod:ChloeBetterTracePools.NAME: Improve Trace
PrismaMod:ChloeBetterTracePools.DESCRIPTION: Removes common cards from trace pool.

PrismaMod:ChloeDoubleRelicSpeed.NAME: Speed Trace
PrismaMod:ChloeDoubleRelicSpeed.DESCRIPTION: All cards played now count double for Kanshou and Bakuya effects.

PrismaMod:ChloeGreatTracePools.NAME: Greater Trace
PrismaMod:ChloeGreatTracePools.DESCRIPTION: Removes common and uncommon cards from the trace pool.

PrismaMod:ChloeCaladbolg.NAME: Caladbolg
PrismaMod:ChloeCaladbolg.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies !M! times.

PrismaMod:ChloeExcalibur.NAME: Excalibur
PrismaMod:ChloeExcalibur.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deals double damage to bosses.

PrismaMod:ChloeGaeBolg.NAME: Gae Bolg
PrismaMod:ChloeGaeBolg.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! weak, vulnerable, and frail.

PrismaMod:ChloeRhongomyniad.NAME: Rhongomyniad
PrismaMod:ChloeRhongomyniad.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and remove all target's block.

PrismaMod:ChloeRuleBreaker.NAME: Rule Breaker
PrismaMod:ChloeRuleBreaker.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and clear all powers from target.

PrismaMod:ChloeCreateableTraceCard.NAME: Trace On
PrismaMod:ChloeCreateableTraceCard.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. Select 1 card from a specified pool.

PrismaMod:ChloeAnyAttackTrace.NAME: Attack Trace
PrismaMod:ChloeAnyAttackTrace.DESCRIPTION: prismamod:Trace 1 card from any Attack card.

PrismaMod:ChloeAnyCommonTrace.NAME: Common Trace
PrismaMod:ChloeAnyCommonTrace.DESCRIPTION: prismamod:Trace 1 card from any Common card.

PrismaMod:ChloeAnyPowerTrace.NAME: Power Trace
PrismaMod:ChloeAnyPowerTrace.DESCRIPTION: prismamod:Trace 1 card from any Power card.

PrismaMod:ChloeAnyRareTrace.NAME: Rare Trace
PrismaMod:ChloeAnyRareTrace.DESCRIPTION: prismamod:Trace 1 card from any Rare card.

PrismaMod:ChloeAnySkillTrace.NAME: Skill Trace
PrismaMod:ChloeAnySkillTrace.DESCRIPTION: prismamod:Trace 1 card from any Skill card.

PrismaMod:ChloeAnyUncommonTrace.NAME: Uncommon Trace
PrismaMod:ChloeAnyUncommonTrace.DESCRIPTION: prismamod:Trace 1 card from any Uncommon card.

PrismaMod:MiyuChristmas.NAME: Santa Install
PrismaMod:MiyuChristmas.DESCRIPTION: Select !M! cards from your deck and add them to your hand.

PrismaMod:MiyuMaid.NAME: Maid Install
PrismaMod:MiyuMaid.DESCRIPTION: Take double damage for this turn.  Gain [E] [E] [E] energy next turn.

PrismaMod:MiyuCarnivalAOEAttack.NAME: Carnival Sweep
PrismaMod:MiyuCarnivalAOEAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies !M! times.

PrismaMod:MiyuCheapDefend2.NAME: Living Barrier
PrismaMod:MiyuCheapDefend2.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. Gain !B! block. Gain !M! plated armor.

PrismaMod:MiyuDefenseRemoval.NAME: Medusa's Gaze
PrismaMod:MiyuDefenseRemoval.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. Remove all block and apply prismamod:attract.

PrismaMod:MiyuUberAOEAttack.NAME: Energy Drain
PrismaMod:MiyuUberAOEAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Gain !M! [E] next turn for each enemy hit.

PrismaMod:MiyuUncommonAOEAttack.NAME: Sweeping Fire
PrismaMod:MiyuUncommonAOEAttack.DESCRIPTION: Remove all block from enemies. Deal !D! damage to all enemies.

PrismaMod:MiyuUncommonAttack.NAME: Sapphire Lance
PrismaMod:MiyuUncommonAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Increase the damage of this card by !M! for the rest of combat.

PrismaMod:MiyuUncommonDefend.NAME: Greater Energy Barrier
PrismaMod:MiyuUncommonDefend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block.  Increase the block of this card by !M! for the rest of combat.

PrismaMod:MiyuChannelAttackEvoke.NAME: Magical Strike
PrismaMod:MiyuChannelAttackEvoke.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! focus. Deal !D! damage !M! times. Decrease max orb slots by 1.

PrismaMod:MiyuChannelDefendEvoke.NAME: Fortification
PrismaMod:MiyuChannelDefendEvoke.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! focus. Gain !B! block !M! times. Decrease max orb slots by 1.

PrismaMod:MiyuCheapEvoke.NAME: Release
PrismaMod:MiyuCheapEvoke.DESCRIPTION: Evoke. Return a card from the discard pile to your hand.
PrismaMod:MiyuCheapEvoke.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Evoke. Return a card from the discard pile to your hand.

PrismaMod:MiyuEvokeAll.NAME: Grand Release
PrismaMod:MiyuEvokeAll.DESCRIPTION: Evoke all orbs. Draw !M! card for each orb evoked.

PrismaMod:MiyuEvokeAllAttack.NAME: Limit Breaker
PrismaMod:MiyuEvokeAllAttack.DESCRIPTION: Evoke all orbs. Deal !D! damage !M! times.

PrismaMod:MiyuEvokeAllDefend.NAME: Friend's Protection
PrismaMod:MiyuEvokeAllDefend.DESCRIPTION: Evoke all orbs. Gain !B! block !M! times.

PrismaMod:MiyuEvokeBuffDex.NAME: Rider's Gift
PrismaMod:MiyuEvokeBuffDex.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. Evoke. Gain !M! dexterity for one turn.

PrismaMod:MiyuEvokeBuffStr.NAME: Gil's Gift
PrismaMod:MiyuEvokeBuffStr.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. Exhaust all non attack cards in hand. Gain !M! gold.

PrismaMod:MiyuEvokeCheapAttack.NAME: Assassin Include
PrismaMod:MiyuEvokeCheapAttack.DESCRIPTION: Evoke. Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! weak, frail, and vulnerable.

PrismaMod:MiyuEvokeCheapDefend.NAME: Ruler Include
PrismaMod:MiyuEvokeCheapDefend.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. Evoke. Take half damage for the next turn.

PrismaMod:MiyuOrbIncreasePerm.NAME: Major Magic Expansion
PrismaMod:MiyuOrbIncreasePerm.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. Gain !M! orb slots for the rest of combat.

PrismaMod:MiyuMultiEvoke.NAME: Complete Release
PrismaMod:MiyuMultiEvoke.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Evoke X times. Draw X cards.
